review: Love the Fire. Haven't had cable in a few years, but this brings all the content I could want. Sleek design and easy to use. Make sure you Amazon Prime, which is an awesome deal to, to really enjoy all the features the fire has to offer. Besides the TV and movies, there is music, cool apps, and the photo storage is awesome. The features and content will only grow over time. Hopefully studios will realize the market and start offering direct access to there content such as ESPN so we can watch live sports. Right now you still need cable service to access apps such as HBO GO and Watch ESPN, but as I mentioned things will change. Get the Fire now.
